forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
